title: UCDOStatus
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: UCDOStatus

AzureADDeviceId.description: A GUID corresponding to the AAD tenant to which the device belongs.

AzureADTenantId.description: A GUID corresponding to this device's AAD device ID.

BWOptPercent28Days.description: Bandwidth optimization (as a percentage of savings of total bandwidth otherwise incurred) as a result of using delivery optimization for this device, computed on a rolling 28-day basis.

BWOptPercent7Days.description: Bandwidth optimization (as a percentage of savings of total bandwidth otherwise incurred) as a result of using delivery optimization for this device, computed on a rolling 7-day basis.

BytesFromCache.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from cache.

BytesFromCDN.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from a CDN versus a peer. This counts against bandwidth optimization.

BytesFromGroupPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from group peers.

BytesFromIntPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from internet peers.

BytesFromPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from peers.

City.description: Approximate city device was in while downloading content, based on IP address.

ContentDownloadMode.description: Device's delivery optimization download mode that was used for this content.

ContentType.description: The type of content being downloaded.

Country.description: Approximate country device was in while downloading content, based on IP address.

DeviceName.description: User or organization-provided device name. If this appears as '#', then you may need to configure devices to send device name.

DOStatusDescription.description: A short description of DO's status, if any.

DownloadMode.description: Device's delivery optimization download mode as configured on the device.

DownloadModeSrc.description: The source of the download mode configuration.

GlobalDeviceId.description: Microsoft global device identifier. This is a identifier used by Microsoft internally.

LastCensusSeenTime.description: A DateTime corresponding to the last time the device sent data to Microsoft. Indicates freshness of any fields of this record.

NoPeersCount.description: The count of peers this device interacted with.

OSVersion.description: The version of Windows 10. This typically is of the format of the year of the version's release, following the month. In this example, 1909 corresponds to 2019-09 (September). This maps to the Major portion of OSBuild.

PeerEligibleTransfers.description: Total count of eligible transfers by peers.

PeersCannotConnectCount.description: The count of peers this device was unable to connect to.

PeersSuccessCount.description: The count of peers this device successfully connected to.

PeersUnknownCount.description: The count of peers for which there is an unknown relation.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

TimeGenerated.description: Time at which this event was generated.

TotalTimeForDownload.description: The total time it took to download the content.

TotalTransfers.description: The total count of data transfers to download this content.
